row1.name: Double-Edged Sword
row1.desc: Melee - Deal an addition 2% damage and receive an addition

row1.name: Butcher
row1.desc: Basic attacks and single target spells deal an additional 2 damage to minions and monsters. This does not trigger off of area of effect damage or damage over time effects.

row2.name: Expose Weakness
row2.desc: Damage an enemy with a spell increases allied champions' damage to that enemy by 1% for the next 3 seconds

row2.name: Brute Force
row2.desc: +# Attack Damage at level 18 (# Attack Damage per level)

row4.name: Dangerous Game
row4.desc: Champions kills and assists restore 5% missing Health and Mana

row5.name: Frenzy
row5.desc: Critical hits grants +5% Attack Speed for 3 seconds(stacks up to 3 times)

row5.name: Arcane Blade
row5.desc: Basic Attacks also deal bonus magic damage equal to 5% of Ability Power

row1.name: Block
row1.desc: Reduces incoming damage from champion basic attacks by #

row1.name: Enchanted Armor
row1.desc: Increases bonus Armor and Magic Resist by #%

row1.name: Tough Skin
row1.desc:
Reduces damage take from neutral monsters by # 
This does not affect lane minions

row2.name: Unyielding
row2.desc:
Melee - Reduces all incoming damage from champions by 2
Ranged - Reduces all incoming damage from champions by 1

row2.name: Bladed Armor
row2.desc:
Taking Basic Attack Damage from neutral monsters cause them to bleed, dealing physical damage equal to 1% of their current Health each second
This does not work against lane minions

row3.name: Opression
row3.desc: Reduces damage taken by 3% from enemies that have impaired movement (slows, snares, taunts, stuns, etc)

row4.name: Perserverance
row4.desc: Regenerates #% of missing Health every 5 seconds

row4.name: Swiftness
row4.desc: Reduces the effectiveness of slows by #%

row4.name: Reinforced Armor
row4.desc: Reduces the total damage taken from critical strikes by #%

row4.name: Evasive
row4.desc: Reduces damage taken by #% from Area of Effect magic damage

row5.name: Second Wind
row5.desc: Increases self-healing, Health Regen, Lifesteal, and Spellvamp by #% when below 25% Health

row5.name: Legendary Guardian
row5.desc: +# Armor and # Magic Resist for each nearby enemy champion

row5.name: Runic Blessing
row5.desc: Start the game with a 50 Health shield. This shield regenerates each time after respawning

row6.name: Tenacious
row6.desc: Reduces the duration of crowd control effects by 15%

row1.name: Phasewalker
row1.desc:
Reduces the casting time of Recall by 1 second
Dominion - Reduces the casting time of Enhanced Recall by 0.5 seconds

row1.name: Scout
row1.desc: Increases the cast range of trinket items by 15%

row2.name: Summoner's Insight
row2.desc: Reduces the cooldown of Summoner Spells by n%

row2.name: Strength of Spirit
row2.desc: +1 Health Regen per 5 seconds for every 300 maximum Mana

row2.name: Alchemist
row2.desc: Increases the duration of potions and elixers by 10%

row3.name: Runic Affinity
row3.desc: Increase the duration of shrine, relic, quest, and neutral monster buffs by 20%

row3.name: Culinary Master
row3.desc: Health potions are upgraded into Biscuits that restore an additional 20 Health and 10 mana instantly upon consumption

row4.name: Scavenger
row4.desc: +1 Gold each time an ally kills a nearby lane minion

row4.name: Inspiration
row4.desc: +n Experience every 10 seconds while near a higher level allied champion

row5.name: Bandit
row5.desc:
Melee - Grants +15 Gold on champion kill or assist
Ranged - Grants +3 Gold each time an enemy champion is attacked. This cannot trigger on the same champion more than once every 5 seconds

row5.name: Intelligence
row5.desc: +n% Cooldown Reduction and reduces the cooldown of Activated Items by m%
